name: Anastasiya Kharitonova
description: I am a skilful front-end developer with expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining web UI. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, team player, highly flexible and adaptive. Proficient in an assortment of technologies, including HTML, SASS, Bootstrap 5, Git, JavaScript (React, React Hooks), Webpack, REST API, Drupal 10, email developing, Flexbox, Grid, Linters, Figma. Receptive to new ideas and different opinions.
